code: @Override public void pre(Span span, Exchange exchange, Endpoint endpoint) {     super.pre(span, exchange, endpoint).     span.setTag(Tags.DB_TYPE.getKey(), "sql").     Object sqlquery = exchange.getIn().getHeader(CAMEL_SQL_QUERY).     if (sqlquery instanceof String) {         span.setTag(Tags.DB_STATEMENT.getKey(), (String) sqlquery).     } }
